mapper.sql: select t.rec_id, t.follow_person, t.customer_id, t.rec_status, t.rec_person, t.rec_time, t.rec_updateperson, t.rec_updatetime, u.nick_name as user_name, u1.nick_name as follow_name, c.customer_name from d_user_customer t left join sys_user u on t.rec_person=u.user_name left join d_customer c on t.customer_id=c.rec_id left join sys_user u1 on t.follow_person=u.user_name
